aligning with hireright builds upon our promise to provide employers with the tools and solutions to help improve their recruitment efficiency and complete the hiring process with confidence

we believe hireright's leading employment screening solutions will nicely augment monster's wide range of category-leading recruitment offerings and are pleased to be able to offer our customers these background screening capabilities
